text: Hi all, does anyone know how not to allow users to submit more than once a contact form with the same email address? We just noticed that in the same contact form, you could register endless times using the same email. We'd like to display a pop-up screen for those users that have already submitted the form saying "you are a already subscribed user"
When. you say register are you referring to the actual membership registration form or another form that is essentially requesting memberhsip access?
